actionCalls.name: Email_RAS_Tech_Form_link_send
actionCalls.label: Email RAS Tech Form link send

rules.name: Update_Case_Default_parameters_Type
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7)
rules.label: Err Type OR Status

rules.name: Send_Tech_Form0
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Send Tech Form

rules.name: Unable_to_Send_Tech_Form0
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: No ICT Specified

rules.name: Unable_To_Send_Tech_Form_No_Opt_IN
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 7 AND (5 OR 6)
rules.label: No Opt Response

Flow.description: Manual flow that only initiates if either the Automated Flow via Process builder or Manually triggered via 'Send Form' button and associated validation flow
Flow.label: RAS Case Manual

recordUpdates.name: Update_Status_AND_Type_AND_Prod
recordUpdates.label: Update Status AND Type AND Prod

fields.name: Amend_Case_Parameters_MSG
fields.fieldText: Either of these case fields do not meet the *Required criteria for sending the form.

fields.name: CaseType_MSG
fields.fieldText:
.
Type: {!sObjCase.Type}
{!IncorrectCaseType}

fields.name: CaseStatus_MSG
fields.fieldText:
.
Status: {!sObjCase.Status}
{!IncorrectCaseStatus}
.

fields.name: CaseProd_MSG
fields.fieldText:
.
Product Category: {!sObjCase.Product_Category__c}
{!IncorrectProduct}
.

fields.name: Amend_Case_Parameters_Outcome
fields.fieldText: By clicking on 'Next' these fields will be automatically amended without having to access the case outside of this pop-up window. If you do not want to update them now, simply exit this window .

fields.name: Exit1
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: UnabletoSendVerificationForm_MSG_0_0
fields.fieldText: This case is closed, please create a new case .

fields.name: Exit_0
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: Amend_Case_Parameters_MSG_1
fields.fieldText:
The form cannot be sent at this time as the Case Contact is not specified. Please amend case details and reattempt to send form
.

fields.name: Exit0
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: UnabletoSendVerificationForm_MSG_0
fields.fieldText: The form cannot be sent as this school records reflect that Remote Access is already active . School Account > Managed Network Add-on Services Remote Access: {!sObjAccount.Remote_Access__c} .

fields.name: Exit
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: TechFormAlreadySent_MSG
fields.fieldText: The Tech form has been sent and cannot be sent again. . If you need to send the form link again and their has been no response (i.e. original email was misplaced or contact has changed) please compose and send an email using template "RAS 3 ICT Intro Email', provided in Template folder "N4L Auto Emails (External Facing)". .

fields.name: TechFromURL_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Below is the link to the sheet that hosts the form responses
Tech Responses Google Sheet
.

fields.name: Exit2
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: TechFormAlreadySent_MSG_0
fields.fieldText: The Service Request has been submitted. .

fields.name: Exit2_0
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: TechFormAlreadySent_MSG_0_0
fields.fieldText: The Tech form has been completed and response received. . If the response is to be amended, please provide them to the assigned Support Engineer. .

fields.name: Exit2_0_0
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: TechFormSentMSG
fields.fieldText:
Verification form has been sent.
.
The case has been updated to reflect:
  • Status: Awaiting Customer Response
  • Form Status: Tech Form Sent
  • Awaiting Customer Response Reminder: Off
  • Google Doc info captured for the associated Form response sheet
    • .

fields.name: RefreshMSG0
fields.fieldText: {!RefreshCase} .

fields.name: ExitMSG
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: Unable_to_Send_Tech_Form_No_Opt_IN_SCRN_MSG
fields.fieldText: The Tech form cannot be sent at this time as records currently do not reflect the school Opting In for the service. . Please check account and email records and amend if necessary and re-attempt .

fields.name: Exit3
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: UnabletoSendTechForm_MSG
fields.fieldText: The Tech form cannot be sent as the ICT Implementation Contact is not specified. .

fields.name: Exit4
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: VerificationFormAlreadySent_MSG
fields.fieldText: The Verification form has been sent and no response has been received. . The Technical Form can only be sent once a response has been received on the initial form. . If you need to send the form link again and their has been no response (i.e. original email was misplaced or contact has changed) please compose and send an email using template "RAS 1 School Intro Email', provided in Template folder "N4L Auto Emails (External Facing)". .

fields.name: GSheet_VerificationURL
fields.fieldText:
Below is the link to the sheet that hosts the form responses
Verification Responses Google Sheet
.

fields.name: Exit5
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

fields.name: VerFormSentMSG_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Verification form has been sent.
The case has been updated to reflect:
  • Status: Awaiting Customer Response
  • Form Status: Verification Form Sent
  • Awaiting Customer Response Reminder: Off
  • Google Doc info captured for the associated Form response sheet
    • .

fields.name: refreshMSG
fields.fieldText: {!RefreshCase} .

fields.name: ExitMSG_0
fields.fieldText: {!ExitWin_MSG}

textTemplates.name: Chttr_TechFormSent
textTemplates.text: Form pre-fill link has been sent via email to case contact and following updated - case Status: 'Awaiting Customer', Form Status: 'Tech Form Sent', Account > Remote Access: 'Opt In'

textTemplates.name: Chttr_VerFormSent
textTemplates.text: Form pre-fill link has been sent via email to case contact and following updated - case Status: 'Awaiting Customer', Form Status: 'Verification Form Sent'

textTemplates.name: ExitWin_MSG
textTemplates.text: To exit pop-up window, simply close window

textTemplates.name: RefreshCase
textTemplates.text: Please Note: to see the changes reflected on the case, you need to refresh the case window
